content: double_crochet in mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beginning chain 5 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 17 17 19 19 19 21 t-3 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 mod bs in chain 2 space double_crochet in mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet *chain 2 skip 1 double_crochet mod bs in chain 2 space double_crochet in mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around to last chain 2 space mod bs in chain 2 space skip mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet join with a slip_stitch to beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 16 16 18 18 18 20 t-4 double_crochet round 5 chain 5 counts as double_crochet + chain 2 mod bs in chain 2 space *double_crochet in mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 mod bs in chain 2 space repeat from * around to last chain 2 space mod bs in chain 2 space skip mod bs or previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beginning chain 5 6 6 7 8 f+1 mod bs 12 12 14 16 t-4 double_crochet repeat rounds repeat round 5 - 6 6 7 8 9 10 h-1 times or until sleeve reaches desired length last round chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet in chain 2 space half_double_crochet in top of mod bs of previous row half_double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet repeat from * around to last chain 2 space 2 half_double_crochet in chain 2 space half_double_crochet in top of mod bs of previous row half_double_crochet in double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning chain 2 40 40 45 45 45 50 5*f half_double_crochet close-up of the bead stitch bs a special thank you to relynn johnson for all her help in writing this pattern visit http //dare2bdifferentcrochet blogspot com for more of her work this pattern may not be sold or distributed items created from this pattern may not be used for internet sales but may be used for local sales © 2008 andrea moberly
